tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE perishable_ingredients (
  ingredient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  expiration_date DATE NOT NULL,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  restock_alert BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE ingredients (ingredient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
name TEXT,
expiration_date DATE,
quantity INT);

CREATE TABLE ingredients (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  expiration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE restocking_alerts (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ingredient_id INT,
  stock_quantity INT,
  alert_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE restocking_history (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ingredient_id INT,
  restocked_quantity INT,
  restock_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE restock_history (
  restock_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  stock_id INT,
  restock_date DATE NOT NULL,
  quantity_restocked INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (stock_id) REFERENCES ingredient_stock(stock_id)
);
